ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Intermediate variant of MCC showing vesicular, basophilic nuclei with prominent nucleoli and multiple mitoses: Three color slides showing intermediate variant of MCC, small-cell variant, and trabecular variant. This is actually Figure 5 because Table 2 had to be a Figure (4) because of CDR (8-col.) constrictions and permission restrictions.

Captions.MediaCaption: Figure 4. (A) Intermediate variant of MCC showing vesicular, basophilic nuclei with prominent nucleoli and multiple mitoses. (B) Small-cell variant, histologically indistinguishable from bronchial small-cell carcinoma. (C) Trabecular variant is rare and normally only seen as a small component of a mixed variant. Goessling W et al: Merkel Cell Carcinoma, J Clin Oncol, 20 (2), pp. 588–98. Reprinted with permission. © 2009 American Society of Clinical Oncology. All rights reserved
